data.persona: I am a hard working farmer of the kingdom. I am also a peasant. The farmers and I tend to the fields for all.
data.description:
You are in the Old Crypt.
Broken stones and a iron gate closing the entrance with a name placard that the name is worn off.
There's a stone, an iron gate, a gate, a flowers, a small crucifix, a helmet, a name placard, a sword, and a placard here.
The a large black vulture is here.

You are carrying a Tool.

data.short_motivation: I must protect the sacred items kept within the old crypt.
data.mid_motivation: I must prove to the king that the old crypt was undisturbed.
data.long_motivation: I am responsible for the estates and properties of the king's dead forbearers. I must keep these items safe for as long as I am able.

timeline.label: 2 hours ago
timeline.action: get the shovel from my toolshed.

timeline.label: 15 minutes ago
timeline.action: wield the shovel to fill a hole at the old crypt entrance.

timeline.label: 5 minutes ago
timeline.action: follow a large black vulture into the old crypt.

timeline.label: 10 minutes from now
timeline.action: wield the nearby sword against the vulture after my first attempt to kill it fails.

timeline.label: 30 minutes from now
timeline.action: give the dead vulture to other vultures to eat, outside the old crypt.

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: eat a celebratory meal while watching the vulture being eaten by other vultures.
